title: Dinner With Pamela Anderson or Horseback Riding on the Beach? Discover the Hidden Pleasures of the Deauville American Film Festival
summary: It's Europe's chicest film festival, but you probably know nothing about it. Here, THR runs through the highlights of the 51st edition, set amid lavish events and stunning Normandy sunsets.
